data.text: @CliffyD Yeah, I have been to Florida various times in my life. It’s a necessary evil on occasion. Jealous you have seen the 49ers…

@Brandon95329759 I actually enjoyed my trip to Tampa to see the Niners play the Bucs in 2018. There just seems to be such a blatant disregard for the safety of others right now.

Hopefully that will eventually improve.
@CliffyD I gotta say, I love coming to your City multiple times every year, Cliffy. I have no desire to go to Florida! Ever!!!
@CliffyD Why is the COVID in Quebec better than in Florida?

@JaniceOwen @CliffyD We spent one night in Tampa before getting on our cruise.  Let's just say we didn't leave the hotel based on what we saw (also it was raining or we nay have for a stroll along the river walk)
@CliffyD It's not Covid keeping me from Florida....its their anti LGBTQ actions they are promoting. Backwards idiots there
@CliffyD The only burn this winter is a wind burn.
